title: Arrise(PragmaticPlay) | 41 LPA | SDE-2
content:
**Education**: B.Tech in Computer Science
**Years of Experience**: 3 years
**Prior Experience**: Software Engineer at top FinTech
**Date of the Offer**: February 2024
**Company**: Arrise formerly known as PragmaticPlay
**Title/Level**: SDE - 2
**Location**: Hyderabad/Noida
**Salary**: INR 36 LPA(Base)
**Relocation**: INR 1.05 LPA
**Signing Bonus**: INR 2 LPA
**Stock Bonus**: N/A
**Performance Bonus**: INR 2 LPA
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)**: ~ INR 41 LPA
**Benefits**: Fitness Program Fee reimbursement + Medical Insurance + Loyalty Bonus + Meal and transportation re-imbursement.

title: Google | L3 | Banglore
content:
Education: Btech + Mtech from Tier-1 college
Yoe: Close to 1 yoe from AMAZON and then I was on career break for more than 6M
Previous 1st yr compensation: 16.5 + 9.5 + some other stuff = ~27 LPA

Company: Google
Title/Level: SDE-2/L3
Location: Banglore
Base: 21L
Annual bonus: 15 % of base
Joining bonus: 3L
Stocks: $44.5k stock grant vested over 4 years (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
Total Compensation for 1st year: ~41L

My interview feedbacks were pretty good.

Any comments over this offer? [ Provided, I am also holding an offer from PhonePe, but it's compensation is not as good as Google ]. 

My point: I went through various compensation posts, and found that they have given .......Base > 24L and Stocks > 60K at L3 level.

Is it a Lowball situation from Google, bcoz even for promotion I need atleast 1.5-2 yrs??
yoe: Close To 1 Yoe From Amazon And Then I Was On Career Break For More Than 6m

title: Bajaj Finserv Data Analyst [Accepted]
content:
- Education: B.Tech
- Year of Experience: 0-1 Year
- Date of the Offer: 5 Jun 2023
- Company: Bajaj Finserv

- Incentive: 50K every 3 months + performance
